attributes.additional_details:
“26  If you have at any time had an application for the grant or renewal
of a firearm or shot gun certificate refused in writing or a
certificate revoked or partially revoked, give details‘”
On grounds that such data is superfluous to the Applicant’s presentation of Form 468 & Form 101.

“Part E Referees”
Application for a Firearm License is not a crime within the UK and thus insinuation that Witnesses need be present to corroborate data violates the Applicants right to petition as a Civilian his or her Government and the various Agencies.

Amend the field marked

“19  ‘Give details of each firearm you wish to purchase, acquire or possess, the reasons for requiring each of them
(details of shooting disciplines etc), and where you intend to use each of them (other than those in 17)’”
Shall be changed to “19 ‘Give details of each firearm you wish to purchase, acquire or possess‘”
